messages.home_btn_sub_apply: Apply for Bytom Sidechain Block Producer
messages.form_title: Bytom Sidechain Block Producer application form
messages.form_label_name: Please fill  the official name of the organization/individual  for Bytom Sidechain Block Producer:
messages.form_label_name_des: Name will be displayed in the voting page
messages.form_label_intro: Please fill the introduction of the organization/individual:
messages.form_label_intro_des: Introduction will be displayed in the voting page
messages.form_label_location: Please indicate the location of your headquarters:
messages.form_label_btm: Please fill your BTM wallet address：
messages.form_label_btm_des: Balance should be more than 1,000,000 BTM
messages.form_label_sn: Please list all your media accounts or community channels
messages.form_label_sn_des: At least one media account(Weibo/Twitter/Telegram channel/Medium/Steem) or community channel(Wechat /Reddit/ Forum/Telegram group/Facebook grouop)
messages.form_label_plan: Please fill your promotion strategy and plan for Block Producer election:
messages.form_label_plan_des: Please fill the reliable marketing strategy and plan
messages.form_label_wish: Please fill your vision about Bytom Sidechain network and your election manifesto for Block Producer
messages.form_label_wish_des: This will be displayed on the voting site as your masternode candidate manifesto
messages.form_label_reward: How much will you distribute to your voters?
messages.form_label_reward_des: 0%~100%,Allocation will be displayed in the voting page
messages.form_label_logo: Please upload the LOGO of the organization/individual for Bytom Sidechain Block Producer:
messages.vote_mobile_title: Early-bird Round for Bytom Sidechain Voting
messages.modal_web_rule_1: In the early bird voting, Your balance must be more than your total number of early bird votes
messages.modal_web_rule_2: Official votes should be more than your total number of early bird votes or you can't get early bird reward
messages.modal_web_step_2: 2.Use sign-message command to sign the following message：
messages.modal_web_step_3: 3.Input your wallet infomation and sign result：
messages.modal_vote_tips: Early-bird voting has closed, please download Bycoin or Vapor/Bytom Desktop Wallet to vote.
messages.index_sub_title: Mainchain-sidechain  BaaS Platform based on BUTXO
messages.index_feature_1_des: Bystack adopts unique mainchain-sidechain collaborative working model. Sidechain Vapor operates large-scale commercial applications, while mainchain Bytom ensures security and stability.
messages.index_feature_2_des: Bystack is suitable for a wide range of business application scenarios, provides plenty of pluggable service, as well as a complete application ecosystem, support one-click release of business applications.
messages.index_feature_3_des: Bystack provides one-stop blockchain solutions as well as efficient and easy-to-use blockchain services and development tools to enterprises and developers of different scales.
messages.index_feature_4_des: The consensus network of Bystack is open and transparent. The consensus mechanism of  Vapor is DPoS+BBFT, and anyone can be a consensus node.
messages.index_platform_subtitle: Bystack is a general blockchain application stacking platform{br}that inherits and implements a blockchain three-tier architecture.
messages.index_platform_item1_des: Bystack relies on public Bytom platform and Vapor sidechain. Through Federation as an interactive protocol between the main chain and side chain, Bystack provides a channel for the transmission of values and lay a solid foundation to the upper application.
messages.index_platform_item2_des: By abstracting the underlying blockchain technology and integrating all kinds of business scenarios to develop common components，mid-ground makes the whole system highly modular and provides the development mode with maximum freedom for merchants and developers.
messages.index_platform_item3_des: The upper layer provides multiple types of access,Bycoin provides mobile solutions, Byone provides desktop solutions while Bystore provides developers with a powerful development platform.
messages.index_base_subtitle: The assets between mainchain and sidechain can be exchanged freely through Main-side chain collaboration. Mainchain ensures security and stability while sidechain will explore performance,scalibility and more innovation.
messages.index_base_tab1_des: The mainchain-sidechain protocol is essentially a cross-blockchain solution. This solution allows for the transfer of digital assets from one chain to another and vice versa. In Bystack , the blockchain network that creates and stores assets is often referred to as the mainchain, while the assisting chain is called the sidechain. The sidechain protocol is envisioned as a way to allow digital assets to be transferred between the mainchain and the sidechain.
messages.index_bc_subtitle: As the core of the entire enterprise-level blockchain, Blockcenter expands the capabilities of the underlying mainchain and sidechain. On the other hand, it abstracts the underlying blockchain technology to provide a typical application development framework, while also provides maintenance, monitoring and upgrades.
messages.index_apps_subtitle: Bystack provides complete development tools and development specifications. combining with the multi-language solutions of mobile terminal and desktop terminal provided by Bycoin SDK and Byone, it is very convenient to develop DApp by using various functions of Blockcenter.
messages.index_apps_item1_des: Bycoin is a mobile light wallet based on Bystack and it's secure, stable and ease of use to help users manage their digital assets easily.
messages.index_apps_item2_des: Byone is a desktop wallet based on Bystack which supports several browsers including Chrome and it's secure, ease of use and full-featured.
messages.index_apps_item3_des: Facade DID is an identity system based on Bystack which merchants can integrate Bystack's identity to obtain a decentralized trusted user identity.
messages.index_tool_des: Blockcenter provides complete toolkit and specifications, combined with the Bycoin SDK as a mobile solution, Byone as a desktop solution and Bystore as Dapp open platform which supports multi-language SDK.
messages.wallet_download_des: Bystack provides mobile, explorer extension and desktop digital asset storage plan.{br}Construct functional multi-asset management platform and help users to run BApps on Bystack easily and safely.
messages.wallet_m_testfight_des_2: 2 Click "View in TestFlight" or "Start testing" and install Bycoin.
messages.wallet_m_testfight_des: TestFlight is an Apple official application for public test. You can download public test version to experience new features.
messages.wallet_m_global_title: Login overseas Apple ID to download.
messages.wallet_m_global_des: Login App Store only and do not login iCloud account.
messages.wallet_m_banner_title: Build the portal of digital assets
messages.wallet_m_ft_des: Download more wallet apps on PC
